value.name: One Year After Charlotte Protests, Two Activists Are Running For City Council
value.description: Last summer, protests erupted in Charlotte after the murder of George Floyd. Now, roughly one year later, two Black Charlotte residents are turning that protest into politics by running for City Council.

value.name: Charlotte police defend fatal shooting that sparked protests
value.description: Charlotte police say Keith Lamont Scott was armed and refused to drop his gun before being fatally shot -- but his family disputes that, saying he was reading a book, not holding a gun.
